pictos.name: Augmented Attack
pictos.lumina_effect: Increases physical attack damage by 10%. Critical hits restore 1 AP.
pictos.description: Enhances basic attacks with increased damage and critical hit benefits.

pictos.name: Anti-Charm
pictos.lumina_effect: Immunity to Charm status effects. Mental debuffs have 50% reduced duration.
pictos.description: Provides protection against mind-affecting abilities and charm effects.

pictos.name: Energising Break
pictos.lumina_effect: Gain +2 AP when breaking an enemy's guard. Party members gain +1 AP when you break.
pictos.description: Rewards aggressive play with AP generation from guard breaks.

pictos.name: Critical Surge
pictos.lumina_effect: Each critical hit increases next critical damage by 25%. Stacks up to 3 times.
pictos.description: Builds momentum through consecutive critical hits for escalating damage.

pictos.name: Defensive Mastery
pictos.lumina_effect: Perfect blocks restore 5% HP and grant damage reduction for 2 turns.
pictos.description: Rewards skillful defensive play with healing and damage mitigation.

pictos.name: Elemental Harmony
pictos.lumina_effect: Elemental skills cycle through elements: Fire → Water → Earth → Air. Each element applies unique debuffs.
pictos.description: Masters all elemental forces for diverse tactical options.

pictos.name: Gradient Boost
pictos.lumina_effect: Gradient Skills charge 50% faster. Using Gradient Skills doesn't end turn.
pictos.description: Enhances the unique Gradient Skill system for more frequent usage.

pictos.name: Overcharge Amplifier
pictos.lumina_effect: Overcharge charges build 100% faster. Overcharge attacks affect 3x3 area.
pictos.description: Specialized enhancement for Gustave's Overcharge ability.

pictos.name: Elemental Mastery
pictos.lumina_effect: Elemental Stains last 2 turns longer. Can stack up to 3 of the same stain type.
pictos.description: Specialized enhancement for Lune's Elemental Stain system.

pictos.name: Stance Dancer
pictos.lumina_effect: Switching stances doesn't cost AP. Each stance switch grants +10% damage for 3 turns.
pictos.description: Specialized enhancement for Maelle's Stance System.

pictos.name: Foretell Master
pictos.lumina_effect: Sun and Moon charges build simultaneously. Perfect predictions restore party AP.
pictos.description: Specialized enhancement for Sciel's Foretell System.

pictos.name: Perfection Seeker
pictos.lumina_effect: Perfect rankings provide exponentially increasing bonuses. S-rank actions grant party buffs.
pictos.description: Specialized enhancement for Verso's Perfection Ranking system.

pictos.name: Bestial Fury
pictos.lumina_effect: Mask transformations last 50% longer. Captured skills have 25% reduced AP cost.
pictos.description: Specialized enhancement for Monoco's Bestial Wheel system.

pictos.name: Parry Master
pictos.lumina_effect: Perfect parries grant 2 AP and automatically counter. Parry window increased by 25%.
pictos.description: Masters the art of precise parrying for offensive counter-attacks.

pictos.name: Dodge Specialist
pictos.lumina_effect: Perfect dodges grant movement bonus and next attack is guaranteed critical.
pictos.description: Specializes in evasive maneuvers with offensive follow-up benefits.

pictos.name: AP Efficiency
pictos.lumina_effect: All abilities cost 1 less AP (minimum 1). Start battles with +2 AP.
pictos.description: Optimizes action point usage for more actions per turn.

pictos.name: Status Immunity
pictos.lumina_effect: Immune to 2 random status effects per battle. Debuffs have 75% reduced duration.
pictos.description: Provides comprehensive protection against negative status effects.

pictos.name: Team Support
pictos.lumina_effect: Adjacent allies gain 15% of your stat bonuses. Party abilities affect all members regardless of range.
pictos.description: Enhances party synergy with stat sharing and extended ability ranges.

pictos.name: Burst Damage
pictos.lumina_effect: First attack each turn deals +100% damage. Killing enemies extends burst to next target.
pictos.description: Specializes in high-damage opening strikes with chain kill potential.

pictos.name: Resource Management
pictos.lumina_effect: 25% chance abilities don't consume resources. Resource-based abilities are 50% more effective.
pictos.description: Optimizes resource consumption for extended battle sustainability.

offensive.name: Offensive Lumina
offensive.description: Increases damage output and offensive capabilities

support.name: Support Lumina
support.description: Affects AP gain, buffs, status effects, and team synergy

mastery_system.description: Win 4 battles with a Pictos equipped to unlock its Lumina permanently
benefits: Lumina can be used by any character without equipping the Pictos
Lumina effects become available in the party-wide pool
Higher level Pictos provide stronger Lumina effects
Mastered Pictos contribute to collection completion

lumina_points_system.description: Lumina Points equal to character level required to equip Lumina effects
lumina_points_system.cost_scaling: Each Lumina has individual point cost from 1-5
lumina_points_system.new_game_plus: Higher caps and special Lumina available in NG+
